recipesJson.name: Honey Raisin RY4
recipesJson.author: ENYAWREKLAW
recipesJson.description: Trying to encapsulate the RY4's of yesteryear. This is the version I've landed upon thus far. Rich & nutty RY4, laid upon a raisin honey graham cracker.

reviews.text:
After about 4 day steep. This is my after dinner juice right here. The peanut butter honey is so smooth. Rich thick vape backed by that caramel and gram. Beautiful mix
 Thanks for sharing! Mixing up a big bottle to steep out for after a steak dinner!
